text: This is a list of diseases of foliage plants belonging to the family Asclepiadaceae. ==Plant Species== {| class="wikitable" style="clear" ! colspan=3| Plant Species |- |Code ||Scientifice Name ||Common Name |- |H ||Hoya carnosa ||wax plant |- |} ==Fungal diseases== {| class="wikitable" style="clear" ! colspan=3| Fungal diseases |- |Common name ||Scientific name ||Plants affected |- |Cercospora leaf spot ||Cercospora spp. ||H |- |Gray mold ||Botrytis cinerea ||H |- |Rhizoctonia aerial blight ||Rhizoctonia solani ||H |- |} ==References== *Common Names of Diseases, The American Phytopathological Society Foliage plant (Asclepiadaceae)
title: List of foliage plant diseases (Asclepiadaceae)
